take_control: Take control of your health with Lunari. Track your period, monitor ovulation, and gain insights into your body’s natural rhythms.
track_and_recordv: Track and Record with Ease in One Place
effortlessly_log: Effortlessly log your daily symptoms, moods, and activities. Use the intuitive calendar to keep track of your cycle and monitor.

menstrual_phase_text_1: This phase marks the start of your cycle, where the uterine lining sheds and exits the body as menstrual blood.
symptoms:_text: You may experience cramps, fatigue, mood swings, and lower back pain.
fertilization_text: Very low; your body is shedding the unfertilized egg.
follicular_text_1: During this phase, your body prepares for ovulation. Follicles in the ovaries mature, with one egg becoming dominant.
follicular_text_2: You might feel energized, with clearer skin and a more positive mood.
follicular_text_3: Increasing; your body is preparing to release an egg.
ovulation_text_1: Ovulation is when the mature egg is released from the ovary and is ready to be fertilized.
ovulation_text_2: You may notice a slight rise in body temperature, increased cervical mucus, and heightened libido.
ovulation_text_3: Highest; this is the most fertile time of your cycle.
luteal_text_1: After ovulation, the body prepares for a potential pregnancy. If the egg isn’t fertilized, the body will prepare to start the cycle again.
luteal_text_2: You may experience bloating, breast tenderness, mood swings, and cravings, known as PMS (premenstrual syndrome).
luteal_text_3: Low; the fertile window has passed.
coping_with_pms: Coping with PMS: Tips and Tricks
tracking_your_cycle: Tracking Your Cycle: Why It Matters
how_to_beat_period: How to Beat Period Cravings with Healthy Snacks
iron_rich_foods: Iron-Rich Foods to Combat Period Fatigue
combatting_bloating: Combatting Bloating: Tips to Stay Slim During Your Period
understanding_menstrual_cycle_text_1: Your menstrual cycle is more than just your period. It’s a complex process involving your hormones, uterus, and ovaries, working together to prepare your body for a potential pregnancy. Here’s a quick breakdown of what happens during each phase:
understanding_menstrual_cycle_text_2: This is the start of your cycle, marked by the shedding of your uterine lining. Most women bleed for 3-7 days, and it’s common to experience cramps, fatigue, and mood swings.
understanding_menstrual_cycle_text_3: After your period, your body prepares for ovulation. Estrogen levels rise, and an egg begins to mature in your ovaries. You might feel more energetic and notice improvements in your skin and mood.
understanding_menstrual_cycle_text_4:
Timing: It typically occurs around the middle of the menstrual cycle, usually day 14 in a 28-day cycle, but this can vary depending on the length of the cycle.

Trigger: A surge in luteinizing hormone (LH) from the pituitary gland triggers ovulation.

What Happens:

A mature follicle in one of the ovaries ruptures.

It releases an egg (ovum) into the fallopian tube.

The egg survives for about 12 to 24 hours waiting to be fertilized by a sperm.

what_is_lunari_text: Lunari is a period tracker app that helps you monitor your menstrual cycle, ovulation, and overall health.
how_lunari_work_text:
Lunari lets you log your daily mood, symptoms, period flow, and more.
You can track your health, view patterns over time, and store everything securely in the cloud.
Simple, personal, and always in your pocket.
is_lunari_free_text:
Yes! Lunari is free to use with all core features.
You can also upgrade to Lunari Pro for advanced insights, custom themes, and more.
can_lunari_offline_text:
Yes! Lunari works  online.
Your data is saved on your device via offline mode and syncs to the cloud.
is_my_data_secure: Is my data secure with Lunari?
is_my_data_secure_text:
Yes — your data is safely stored in the cloud using encrypted connections.
Only you can access your information, and we never share it with third parties.
can_export_data: Can I export my Lunari data?
can_export_data_text: You can export your data anytime in a readable format to keep for your records or share with others.
how_contact_support_text:
You can reach out to our support team anytime — just:

Go to Settings → Support inside the app

Tap Contact Us or Send Feedback
Write your message or issue and hit Submit
effective_date_text: At Lunari, your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our app.
information_we_collect_text:
Personal Information: When you sign up, we collect your name, email address, date of birth, and other details you provide.
Health Data: We collect information about your menstrual cycle, symptoms, lifestyle habits, and other health-related data to provide personalized services.
Usage Data: We collect information on how you interact with the app, including pages viewed, features used, and time spent on the app.
Device Information: We collect data about your device, such as your device model, operating system, and IP address.
how_use_your_information_text:
Personalization: We use your health data to provide personalized insights, reminders, and recommendations.
Improvement: We analyze usage data to improve the app’s features, user experience, and performance.
Communication: We use your email to send updates, newsletters, and notifications related to your account and usage.
Compliance: We may use your information to comply with legal obligations.
effective_date_text_2: Welcome to Lunari! By using our app, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
use_of_app_text:
Eligibility: You must be at least 13 years old to use Lunari. By using the app, you represent that you meet this age requirement.
Account Registration: You agree to provide accurate and complete information when creating an account and to keep your account details up to date.
Prohibited Conduct: You agree not to use Lunari for any unlawful or harmful activities, including but not limited to distributing malware, harassing others, or violating any applicable laws.
subscription_text:
Free Version: Lunari offers a free version with basic features.
Paid Subscriptions: Lunari offers monthly and yearly subscription plans with additional benefits. By subscribing, you agree to the payment terms specified at the time of purchase.
Cancellation: You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. No refunds are provided for partial subscription periods.
